title: MINDFUL AI - Reflections on Artificial Intelligence
description: Thoughts, Quotes, Essays, and Articles on Artificial Intelligence.AI is much more than TechnologyThe field of AI is highly interdisciplinary & evolutionary. The more AI penetrates our life and environment, the more comprehensive the points we have to consider and adapt. Technological developments are far ahead of ethical & philosophical interpretations. This fact is disturbing.We need to close this gap as soon as possible.
author: Murat Durmus
